Class_Skill_Desc_Acceleration: Ensures the next Verthunder III, Veraero III/Verthunder, Veraero, or Impact/Scatter can be cast immediately.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Increases the potency of Impact/Scatter by 50</br>Additional Effect: Ensures Verthunder III and Veraero III/Verthunder and Veraero trigger Verfire Ready or Verstone Ready respectively</br>Maximum Charges: 2//
Class_Skill_Desc_Addle: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 5% and magic damage dealt by 10%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Black Shift: Grants Black Shift, altering the effects of several actions.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift.</br>※Action changes to White Shift upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Contre Sixte: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Class_Skill_Desc_Corps-a-corps: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Monomachy</br>Monomachy Effect: Increases damage dealt to target by 10% while lowering damage taken from target by 10%</br>Duration: 7s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Displacement: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: 15-yalm backstep</br>Additional Effect: Grants Manafication</br>Manafication Effect: Increases damage and healing potency of next spell cast by 20%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Embolden: Increases own magic damage dealt by 5% and damage dealt by nearby party members by 5%.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Enchanted Moulinet: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 130 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a Mana Stack</br>//Balance Gauge Cost: 20 Black Mana</br>Balance Gauge Cost: 20 White Mana</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Enchanted Redoublement: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000.</br>Combo Action: Enchanted Zwerchhau</br>Additional Effect: Grants Vermilion Radiance</br>Duration: 10s</br>White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy</br>Black Shift Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 6s</br>※Action changes to Verholy while under the effect of White Shift and Vermilion Radiance.</br>※Action changes to Verflare while under the effect of Black Shift and Vermilion Radiance.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Enchanted Reprise: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 340.</br>Balance Gauge Cost: 5 Black Mana</br>Balance Gauge Cost: 5 White Mana</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Enchanted Riposte: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000.</br>White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy</br>Black Shift Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 6s</br>※Action changes to Enchanted Zwerchhau upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Enchanted Zwerchhau: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 7,000.</br>Combo Action: Enchanted Riposte</br>White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy</br>Black Shift Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 6s</br>※Action changes to Enchanted Redoublement upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Engagement: Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Shares a recast timer with Displacement.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fleche: Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.
Class_Skill_Desc_Frazzle: Increases damage taken by nearby enemies by 10%, while reducing HP recovered via healing actions by 10%.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift.</br>Shares a recast timer with Magick Barrier.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Impact: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 210 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Acceleration Potency: 260</br>Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 3
Class_Skill_Desc_Jolt: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 170.</br>Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Jolt II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 320.</br>Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Magick Barrier: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%, while increasing HP recovered via healing actions by 10%.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift.</br>Shares a recast timer with Frazzle.</br>※Action changes to Frazzle while under the effect of Black Shift.
Class_Skill_Desc_Manafication: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 50.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 6 stacks of Manafication</br>Manafication Effect: Increases magic damage dealt by 5%</br>Duration: 15s</br>//All combos are canceled upon execution of Manafication.</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Moulinet: Delivers an attack with a potency of 60 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Action upgraded to Enchanted Moulinet if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 20 or more.
Class_Skill_Desc_Redoublement: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Combo Action: Zwerchhau or Enchanted Zwerchhau</br>Combo Potency: 230</br>Action upgraded to Enchanted Redoublement if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 15 or more.
Class_Skill_Desc_Reprise: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Action upgraded to Enchanted Reprise if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 5 or more.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resolution: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>White Shift Effect: Silence</br>Duration: 2s</br>Black Shift Effect: Bind</br>Duration: 3s</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Riposte: Delivers an attack with a potency of 130.</br>Action upgraded to Enchanted Riposte if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 20 or more.
Class_Skill_Desc_Scatter: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Acceleration Potency: 170/</br>Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 3
Class_Skill_Desc_Scorch: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 680 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Combo Action: Verflare or Verholy</br>Additional Effect: Increases both Black Mana and White Mana by 4</br>Jolt II and Impact are changed to Scorch upon landing Verflare or Verholy as a combo action.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Skyshard: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 1,650 to all enemies near point of impact.
Class_Skill_Desc_Sleep: Puts target and all nearby enemies to sleep.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Southern Cross: Emblazons a grand cross on the ground beneath a party member or enemy, restoring HP of party members within range while damaging enemies.</br>Cure Potency: 8,000</br>Damage Potency: 8,000</br>White Shift Effect: Cure potency is increased by 50%</br>Black Shift Effect: Damage potency is increased by 50%</br>Targets standing at the cross's center will receive the effects of this action twice.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 90s
Class_Skill_Desc_Starstorm: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 3,600 to all enemies near point of impact.
Class_Skill_Desc_Surecast: Spells can be cast without interruption.</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Veraero: Deals wind damage with a potency of 360.</br>Additional Effect: Increases White Mana by 6</br>Additional Effect: 50% chance of becoming Verstone Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Veraero II: Deals wind damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Increases White Mana by 7
Class_Skill_Desc_Veraero III: Deals wind damage with a potency of 5,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift and Dualcast.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Verfire: Deals fire damage with a potency of 5,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Dualcast, allowing next spell to be cast immediately</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Verflare: Deals fire damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift and Vermilion Radiance.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Verholy: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 8,000</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP of party members near target</br>Cure Potency: 8,000</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift and Vermilion Radiance.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Verraise: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Verstone: Deals earth damage with a potency of 5,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Dualcast, allowing next spell to be cast immediately</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift.</br>※Action changes to Veraero III while under the effect of Dualcast.</br>※Action changes to Verfire while under the effect of Black Shift.</br>※Action changes to Verthunder III while under the effect of Black Shift and Dualcast.
Class_Skill_Desc_Verthunder: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 360.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Black Mana by 6</br>Additional Effect: 50% chance of becoming Verfire Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Verthunder II: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Black Mana by 7
Class_Skill_Desc_Verthunder III: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 5,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift and Dualcast.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_White Shift: Grants White Shift, altering the effects of several actions.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift.</br>Activates automatically when class is changed to red mage.</br>※Action changes to Black Shift upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Zwerchhau: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Combo Action: Riposte or Enchanted Riposte</br>Combo Potency: 150</br>Action upgraded to Enchanted Zwerchhau if both Black Mana and White Mana are at 15 or more.
Class_Status_Desc_Black Shift: Augments certain actions with detrimental effects.
Class_Status_Desc_Displacement: Next spell cast will deal increased damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Frazzle: Damage taken is increased while HP recovered via healing actions is reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Magick Barrier: Damage taken is reduced while HP recovered via healing actions is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Manafication: Damage and cure potency of next spell cast is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Surecast: Spells cannot be interrupted by taking damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Swiftcast: The next spell will be cast immediately.
Class_Status_Desc_White Shift: Augments certain actions with beneficial effects.
Class_Trait_Desc_Dualcast: Grants the effect of Dualcast upon casting any spell with a cast time. While under the effect of Dualcast, your next spell will require no time to cast. Effect is canceled upon execution of any action other than an ability. Auto-attacks do not cancel effect.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Acceleration: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Acceleration.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Displacement: Increases Displacement and Engagement potency to 180.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Jolt: Upgrades Jolt to Jolt II. Also increases the potency of Verthunder and Veraero to 360, and the potency of Verfire and Verstone to 300.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Manafication: Reduces Manafication recast timer to 110 seconds and adds an additional effect that increases magic damage dealt by 5%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Manafication I: Increases maximum stacks of Manafication to 6.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend II: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Mana Stack: Adds a Mana Stack to your Balance Gauge upon landing Enchanted Riposte, Enchanted Zwerchhau, Enchanted Redoublement, or Enchanted Moulinet, up to a maximum of 3.</br>Upon gaining 3 Mana Stacks, Verthunder and Verthunder II are upgraded to Verflare.</br>Upon learning Verholy, gaining 3 Mana Stacks also upgrades Veraero and Veraero II to Verholy.
Class_Trait_Desc_Red Magic Mastery: Reduces Contre Sixte recast timer to 35 seconds and increases the potency of both Verthunder II and Veraero II to 120.
Class_Trait_Desc_Red Magic Mastery II: Upgrades Verthunder to Verthunder III and Veraero to Veraero III.</br>Upon gaining 3 Mana Stacks, Verthunder III is upgraded to Verflare and Veraero III is upgraded to Verholy.
Class_Trait_Desc_Red Magic Mastery III: Increases the potency of Enchanted Riposte to 280, Verthunder II to 140, Veraero II to 140, Verfire to 340, Verstone to 340, Enchanted Zwerchhau to 150, Enchanted Redoublement to 130, Jolt II to 320, Impact to 210, and Enchanted Reprise to 340.
